DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical utility Bioseal adjunct control bleed elective vascular surgery .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects 18 75 year age ; 2 . Undergoing elective vascular surgical procedure presence appropriate Target Bleeding Site ( TBS ) require adjunct achieve hemostasis identify intraoperatively surgeon ; 3 . Able willing comply procedure require protocol ; 4 . Signed date write informed consent prior study related procedure . 1 . Subjects intraoperative finding may preclude conduct study procedure ; 2 . Intended use Fibrin Sealants ( include autologous Fibrin Sealants ) Bioseal TBS ; 3 . Subjects know intolerance blood product one component study product unwilling receive blood product ; 4 . Subjects know allergy previously use porcine derive product ; 5 . Female subject know breastfeed pregnant intend become pregnant clinical study period . 6 . The subject , opinion investigator , would suitable participation study . 7 . Subjects participate another trial within 30 day prior planned start treatment .
